Title: 25 Energy-efficient Tips To Lower Electricity Costs
Body: Change your light bulbs to LEDs. wash your clothes in cold water if possible. Air seal your home. Sealing cracks, gaps and leaks and adding insulation can save up to 10% on home heating and cooling costs. Clean or replace all filters in your home regularly. Dirty filters make your system work harder and run longer than necessary. Use your microwave instead of your stove when cooking.
